values.label: Export
values.comment: The transport movement is to export the goods from the country.

values.label: Import
values.comment: The transport movement is to import the goods into the country.

values.label: Transit
values.comment: The cargo is moving in transit through a country and will not become part of the commerce of that country.

values.label: Relay
values.comment: The cargo is being moved by more than one transport means in succession under the responsibility of the same carrier.

values.label: Transshipment
values.comment: The cargo is being moved by more than one transport means in succession.
